name: Work items and/or activities to be verified

1 - Acceptance of substrate by Waterproofing Subcontractor & 3rd Party WC. Smooth flat finish to falls (no negative falls). Free of deep depressions and/or protrusions. Sheeting finished 2-5mm from concrete substrate. Check wall finishes are flush Door frames 5mm above threshold.
Timing / Frequency - All items to be checked for each area before any works commence
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC /WC/E
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - 3rd Party WC
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer’s recommendations & 3rd Party Consultant
References (Dwg No, Spec, Aust. Standard) - Manufacturer Tech data sheets
2 - Mechanically fix angles/waterstops in accordance with documentation
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings, specification, 3rd Party Consultant recommendations
3 - Prime Area using approved non-porous primer and allow to cure
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer recommendations and spec
References (Dwg No, Spec, Aust. Standard) - AS-3740
Record Type - Photo Records Curing Time
4 - Caulking of all joints, penetrations and changes of direction with approved polyurethane joint sealant.
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC/WC
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer recommendations and standard
References (Dwg No, Spec, Aust. Standard) - AS-3740
5 - Apply first coat of liquid applied waterproof membrane and measure wet film thickness
Method - Physical measure with comb gauge
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC/E
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer recommendations and spec
Record Type - Minimum 3 test / area / coat. logged in register
6 - Apply second coat of liquid applied waterproof membrane and measure wet film thickness
Method - Physical measure with comb gauge
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC/E
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer recommendations and spec
Record Type - Minimum 3 test / area / coat. Logged in register
7 - Allow Curing Times (Liquid Membranes) in accordance with manufacturers spec
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC/E
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer recommendations and spec
8 - Water flood testing to be carried out to ALL WET AREAS. Flood test to a depth of 5mm below highest waterstop. Flood test duration 2 days.
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC/E
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - Verification photos to ALL WET AREAS
References (Dwg No, Spec, Aust. Standard) - AS-3740
Record Type - Photos of ALL flood testing
9 - Acceptance of waterproof membrane areas by a tiler
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC (Tiler)
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturer & 3rd Party Consultant recommendations
10 - Tilers install screed. Confirm the specified fall on screed has been achieved Showers (1:80mm min.) Bathrooms (1:100mm min.)
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC/F
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - Acceptance of screed by waterproofing subcontractor
11 - Prime screed & upturns & allow to cure as per manufacturers recommendation
Timing / Frequency - Before tiling works commence
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Timing / Frequency - Before tiling works commence
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings, specification & manufacturers recommendations
References (Dwg No, Spec, Aust. Standard) - AS-3740
13 - Apply approved wet film screed to shower walls & splashbacks to manufacturers approved thickness and allow to cure
Timing / Frequency - Before tiling works commence
Inspection / Test Done By: Position - SC
Inspection / Test Done By: Company - MDS Stone
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings, specification& manufacturers recommendations
References (Dwg No, Spec, Aust. Standard) - AS-3740
1 - Submit samples and material data sheets for approval by Architect/Client
Submit samples and material data sheets for approval by Architect/Client
Acceptance Criteria - Submit Sample and Technical Data Submission and Approval Form in accordance with specification or its equivalent with Technical Data Sheet and Slip Test Report.
Record Type - Approved Sample and Technical Data Submission and Approval Form
2.1 - Mandatory WHS certificates are sighted & copied.
Acceptance Criteria - Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS) to be approved prior to commencement
Record Type - Approved Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS)
2.2 - SWMS complete & all workers have been inducted into the SWMS
Acceptance Criteria - Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS) to be approved prior to commencement
Record Type - Approved Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS)
2.3 - Check and ensure access to work area.
Acceptance Criteria - Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS) to be approved prior to commencement
Record Type - Approved Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS)
Acceptance Criteria - Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS) to be approved prior to commencement
Record Type - Approved Safe Work Method Statement (SWMS)
3.1 - Check and confirm waterproofing has been completed before commencing work in wet areas.
Timing / Frequency - Prior to Commencing tiling areas
Acceptance Criteria - As per spec, Manufacturer recommendations & 3rd Party Consultant Confirmation
3.2 - Check angles and levels are correct using a digital level.
Timing / Frequency - Prior to Commencing tiling areas
3.3 - Check and measure correct falls in wet areas.
Timing / Frequency - Prior to Commencing tiling areas
Timing / Frequency - Prior to Commencing tiling areas
Timing / Frequency - Prior to Commencing tiling areas
3.6 - Set out of angles above wall/skirting tiles
Timing / Frequency - Prior to Commencing tiling areas
4 - Check and ensure all materials delivered to site as per approved submitted samples
Check and ensure all materials delivered to site as per approved submitted samples
5.1 - Check and ensure sand clean and without any sharps
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and spec
5.2 - Check and ensure FFL before installation of bedding
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and spec
5.3 - Ensure sand & cement ratio is correct which is 4:1
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and spec
5.4 - Screed curing time is 3-4 days before glue is applied
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and spec
5.5 - Check that an admixture is being used in the bedding mix in accordance with the manufacturer’s specification and method statement
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and spec

5.6 - Carry out impact tests to establish the soundness of all screeded substrates. Testing shall include both light tap and heavy weight impact using 4kg, in compliance with a screed tester. Alternative substrate testing methods may be put forward for consideration and acceptance by the Superintendent.
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and spec
6.1 - Check and ensure specification that correct tile/paver has been supplied.
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample
Record Type - Approved Sample and Technical Data Submission and Approval Form
6.2 - Check and ensure walls & floors for square & straightness
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample

6.8 - Wall tiles to be fixed before floor tiles.
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample

6.9 - Mortar bed complete with correct ramps / fall to wastes – 1:60 minimum to shower areas and 1:100 outside the showers
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample

6.10 Ponding Testing-Floor tiles laid to correct RL’s with correct ramps and fall to wastes without ponding
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample

6.11 Ensure that excessive water is not added to the mix
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample
Record Type - Approved Sample and Technical Data Submission and Approval Form
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample
Record Type - Approved Sample and Technical Data Submission and Approval Form
6.13 Verify that there is adhesion over the whole tile area
Acceptance Criteria - As per drawings and as per approved sample

7.1 - Check and ensure correct grout is used including colour and type of grout and thickness
Timing / Frequency - Before commencing grouting works
Acceptance Criteria - As per specification grouting sample to be approved prior to grout commencement
Record Type - Approved Sample and Technical Data Submission and Approval Form
Timing / Frequency - Before commencing grouting works
Acceptance Criteria - As per specification grouting sample to be approved prior to grout commencement

8.1 - Checks falls using digital laser pre and post tiling
Acceptance Criteria - In accordance with Design
8.2 - Ensure workplace is left clean & free of defects.

8.3 - Ensure floor wastes are protected from any materials and debris deposited
